== General Prerequisites ==

* NFC Reader

* Java SE

* Android Device with NFC Chip

_(optional)
* driver for the NFC Reader_
<hr>
== NFC Reader ==

The API is currently compatible with the following NFC-Reader:

* ACR122U Firmeware: 103

_other readers have not been tested yet, please contact us if you got it running with another reader_
<hr>
== Android Phones ==
The API is currently compatible with the following Android Devices / Versions:

* Galaxy Nexus (4.1.2)
